{{Disambiguation}}

'''Apple''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Apple}} – a [[food]] item that can be eaten by the [[player]] or crafted into [[golden apple]]s.
* {{ItemLink|Golden Apple}} – a [[food]] item that bestows beneficial effects when consumed ([[Absorption]] and [[Regeneration]]) and is also used to cure a [[zombie villager]] under the [[Weakness]] effect into a normal [[villager]].
* {{ItemLink|Enchanted Golden Apple}} – a rare and [[Crafting|uncraft]]able food item that, upon consumption, grants much more powerful effects than the [[golden apple]].

=== Editions ===
* [[Apple TV Edition]] – a discontinued derivative of ''[[Pocket Edition]]'' designed to run on {{w|tvOS}}.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{DungeonsItemLink|Apple}} – a [[MCD:Consumable|consumable]] that can be found within various [[MCD:Mission Select|missions]] of ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''.

== ''Minecraft Earth'' ==
*{{ItemLink|Apple|link=Earth:Apple}} – A food item obtained from {{mce|oak leaves}}.
